alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 1:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Big Horn County through 200 PM MDT... At 114 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Lodge Grass, or 24 miles southeast of Hardin, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crow Agency and motorists along I-90 in the Crow Agency vicinity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn
